title: Amber Turner cosies up to beau Dan Edgar... days after his ex Kate Wright married Rio Ferdinand
text:
They've been inseparable since rekindling their relationship earlier this year.

And Amber Turner looked happier than ever with boyfriend Dan Edgar as they posed at a casino themed party in Basildon, Essex on Thursday.

The TOWIE beauty, 26, looked effortlessly glam in an embellished mini dress as she cosied up to her beau, 29, just days after his ex Kate Wright tied the knot with Rio Ferdinand.

Loved-up: Amber Turner looked happier than ever with boyfriend Dan Edgar as they posed at a casino themed party in Basildon, Essex on Thursday

Pulling out all the stops for the night out, Amber looked sensational in the thigh-skimming nude and black number.

Boosting her frame, the reality star tottered around on skyscraper black stilettos.

Amber swept her blonde tresses into a high ponytail, while she coated her face in a layer of glam make-up.

Meanwhile, Dan looked dapper in an all-black ensemble, consisting of a black blazer, T-shirt, trousers and shoes.

The ex files: Amber cosied up to her beau Dan , 29, just days after his ex Kate Wright tied the knot with Rio Ferdinand

The TV hunk appeared in good spirits as he wrapped his arms around his on-off girlfriend as they joined their co-stars for a casino night, just days after his former girlfriend wed her footballer beau in a lavish Turkish ceremony on Friday.

Kate and Rio marked the nuptials with a lavish three-day celebration, with Kate's mother describing the ceremony as the 'best day of my life'.

The TV personality's doting parent Jacqueline told MailOnline: 'It was a beautiful occasion. We've had a wonderful three days. The ceremony was on Friday. I'll never forget it, it was one of the best days in my life.

Rio and Kate’s celebrations kicked off on Thursday with a pre-wedding party, followed by the ceremony and a reception on Friday – where Rio's daughter Tia served as Maid Of Honour.

Stunner: Amber looked effortlessly glam in an nude and black embellished mini dress which she paired with skyscraper black stilettos

Showstopping: Amber swept her blonde tresses into a high ponytail, while she coated her face in a layer of glam make-up

Moving on: Their cosy display comes just days after his former girlfriend wed her footballer beau in a lavish Turkish ceremony on Friday

The reception kicked off mid-afternoon and continued into the night, where the guests enjoyed a boozy free bar and gastronomic delights prepared by expert chefs.

Armed security guards had reportedly been deployed at The D Maris Bay hotel where rooms range from £300 to £5,000 per night, for the three-day wedding celebrations.

Kate and Rio are said to have ended their nuptials with a lavish pool party on Saturday at the 196-room hotel their guests were staying in while out in Turkey.

On Monday, the first official shot from the wedding was revealed by OK! magazine, in which they wowed in Marmaris, Turkey, as former TOWIE star Kate stunned in an ivory lace fishtail Berta gown, which featured a long train and a floor-length veil.

Since their lavish nuptials Kate has made their marriage Instagram official and has changed her surname from Wright to Ferdinand on the photo-sharing site.

Kate and Dan dated on and off for six years before calling time on their relationship for good in 2016.
